Package com.wizturn.sdk.central.state

Provides state classes for describing state of the central.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    CentralState
    State interface which defines a set of methods that every descendant state must implement
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AuthenticatedState
    State that indicates the current peripheral(e.g. beacon) has been authenticated
    AuthenticatingState
    State that indicates the current peripheral(e.g. beacon) is now in the middle of being authenticated
    ChangingMultiplePropertyState
    State that indicates multiple properties of peripheral(e.g. beacon) is being changed now
    ChangingSinglePropertyState
    State that indicates a single property of peripheral(e.g. beacon) is being changed now
    ConnectedState
    State that indicates the peripheral(e.g. beacon) is now connected to a central device(e.g.
    ConnectingState
    State that indicates the peripheral(e.g. beacon) is now in the middle of connecting to a central device(e.g. a smartphone)
    DisconnectedState
    State that indicates the peripheral(e.g. beacon) is disconnected.
    DisconnectingState
    State that indicates the peripheral(e.g. beacon) is now in the middle of disconnecting to the central device(e.g. a smartphone)

Package com.wizturn.sdk.central.state Description

Provides state classes for describing state of the central.
